alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 7:42AM EDT until June 12 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cook County in south central Georgia... South central Berrien County in south central Georgia... West central Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northwestern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Thomas County in south central Georgia... Northern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 830 AM EDT. * At 742 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moultrie, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Moultrie, Adel, Valdosta, Hahira, Sparks, Ray City, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Riverside, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Morven, Berlin, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Barretts, New Lois and Greggs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Berrien; Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes; Thomas
